ActionMessage: Couldn't find the game executable! Are you sure you're running this launcher from the right directory?
Couldn't find the global resource bundle! Your MW installation is most likely corrupt. Consider reinstalling the game and MWO.

Couldn't find the game world files! Your MW installation is either corrupt or you're trying to install MWO onto a pre-V3 installation package [that is, without the actual game]. Please reinstall the game or put the launcher in your actual game folder.
There seems to be a foreign d3d9.dll present in the game folder. We don't guarantee MWO will work properly with this. Consider deleting d3d9.dll.

NFSMW Extra Options modifies the game code in ways that break MWO. Some of the more common features of this mod have been added into MWO, such as the debug world camera, but NFSMW ExOpts itself can cause massive problems such as frequent crashes. Please delete NFSMW Extra Options before proceeding.
MirrorHook does NOT work with the new MWO update, as the hook mechanism has been changed. Please delete MirrorHook before proceeding.
VerbleHack is a cheat. Whether you left it there by accident or installed it on purpose, please delete VerbleHack before proceeding.
RockportEd uses MirrorHook and thus does not support MWO. Please delete RockportEd before proceeding.
